name: Bluebell
description: Bluebells are enchanting flowers known for their vivid blue color, carpeting woodland floors in spring.

name: Buttercup
description: Buttercups are bright yellow flowers that add a splash of sunshine to meadows and grassy areas.

name: Coltsfoot
description: Coltsfoot is a perennial herb with bright yellow flowers, often blooming before its leaves appear.

name: Corn Poppy
description: Corn poppies are vibrant red flowers, often seen in fields and associated with remembrance.

name: Cowslip
description: Cowslips are delicate yellow flowers found in grasslands, beloved for their sweet fragrance.

name: Crocus
description: Crocuses are small, colorful flowers that bloom in early spring, symbolizing renewal and cheer.

name: Daffodil
description: Daffodils are cheerful yellow flowers that herald the arrival of spring, symbolizing rebirth.

name: Daisy
description: Daisies are simple, cheerful flowers with white petals and a yellow center, symbolizing innocence.

name: Dandelion
description: Dandelions are resilient yellow flowers that transform into iconic puffballs, enjoyed by children and pollinators.

name: Foxglove
description: Foxgloves are tall, tubular flowers that bloom in shades of purple, pink, and white, attracting pollinators.

name: Fritillary
description: Fritillaries are elegant bell-shaped flowers, often patterned with checkerboard-like markings.

name: Geranium
description: Geraniums are versatile flowers available in various colors, often found in gardens and pots.

name: Hibiscus
description: Hibiscus flowers are large and showy, often associated with tropical climates and vibrant beauty.

name: Iris
description: Irises are elegant flowers named after the Greek goddess of the rainbow, available in a variety of colors.

name: Lily of the Valley
description: Lily of the Valley is a fragrant, bell-shaped flower symbolizing purity and humility.

name: Pansy
description: Pansies are cheerful flowers with vibrant, velvety petals, often blooming in cooler seasons.

name: Petunia
description: Petunias are popular garden flowers with trumpet-shaped blooms available in a wide range of colors.

name: Rose
description: Roses are iconic flowers symbolizing love and beauty, admired for their colors and fragrance.

name: Snowdrop
description: Snowdrops are delicate white flowers that bloom in late winter, symbolizing hope and renewal.

name: Sunflower
description: Sunflowers are tall, vibrant flowers known for their bright yellow petals and seed-filled heads.

name: Tiger Lily
description: Tiger lilies are bright orange flowers with black spots, symbolizing wealth and prosperity.

name: Tulip
description: Tulips are classic spring flowers, admired for their cup-shaped blooms in a rainbow of colors.

name: Wallflower
description: Wallflowers are fragrant flowers often grown in gardens, available in warm, sunset-like colors.

name: Water Lily
description: Water lilies are floating aquatic flowers, admired for their serene beauty and symbolism in art.

name: Wild Tulip
description: Wild tulips are smaller, delicate versions of their cultivated cousins, found in natural meadows.

name: Windflower
description: Windflowers are dainty white or pink blooms swaying in the breeze, symbolizing anticipation.
